content:
As an AI language model, I don't have the ability to access up-to-date statistical data on how effective McAfee's antivirus software is in protecting against cyber threats compared to other antivirus software in the market. Cyber threats are constantly evolving, and there are various factors that determine the effectiveness of antivirus software, including the type of threats, the frequency of updates, and the performance of the software on different devices.

However, according to recent independent tests conducted by AV-Test and AV-Comparatives, McAfee's antivirus software has been consistently ranked among the top-rated antivirus software in terms of protection, performance, and ease of use. In the latest AV-Test results from May-June 2021, McAfee received a perfect score for protection and a near-perfect score for performance and usability, outperforming many other antivirus software in the market. Similarly, in the latest AV-Comparatives test from March-April 2021, McAfee received an "Advanced+" rating, indicating high levels of protection against known and unknown malware, as well as low false positives.

It's worth noting that no antivirus software can offer 100% protection against all cyber threats, and it's always recommended to use multiple layers of security, such as a firewall and anti-malware software, in addition to antivirus software.
